channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 13:46 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 13:46 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 13:23 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 游릭 13:23 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 13:07 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 13:07 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
